title: The Sofa Cover Replacement is Custom Made for IKEA Ektorp 2 + 2 Sectional Corner Sofa. Cover Only. Ektorp Slipcover Replacement (2+2 Sectional, Beige Polyester)
description: High quality material for these replacement sofa cover compatible for Ikea Ektorp sofa cover. We run a number of tests to make sure that our cover fits well to Ektorp sofas. The package includes one set of sofa covers. Warning: the covers are design only for IKEA Ektorp sofa only. Sofa isn’t included! Warning: Please use air dry, spin dry or dry cleaning in case if you need to wash it. Warning: The materials and colors are different from IKEAs.
